template.description: Inserts a standard-call to SwingUtilities.invokeLater with a inline-defined runnable
template.name: invokelater

template.description: Inserts a list of observers for a standard Sumatra-Observable
template.name: observable_list

template.description: Inserts a list of observers and a notify-method for a standard Sumatra-Observable

template.description: Inserts a notify...(...)-method for a Sumatra-observable
template.name: observable_notify
